GitHub活跃度 {{6.github_activity_score}} stars {{if(6.github_activity_score > 10000; "🔥 极高"; if(6.github_activity_score > 1000; "📈 较高"; "📊 正常"))}}
专利申请 {{6.recent_patents_count}}项 {{if(6.recent_patents_count > 5; "🔬 创新活跃"; if(6.recent_patents_count > 0; "📝 有专利"; "🔍 无新专利"))}}
